title: Chapter 1840 - The Heavens Change
body:
Chapter 1840 - The Heavens Change

Three days passed in a flash. They were entirely uneventful.

The Red Dragon Dao Monarch spent the entire time cultivating within the Dragon Progenitor’s Cauldron, while Xi Ning and Fan Zhui took this time to tend to their injuries.

Su Yi didn’t slack off, either. He gathered all of the trophies to be found in the treasury.

His harvest was shocking!

The experts who’d died here included Great Martial Stage experts of six of the greatest factions in the Immortal Realm, as well as Jing Cheng and the other Giant Whales, numerous prominent experts of the Eastern Sea, and three attendants of divine children, Zuo Huai, Lin Gu, and Huang Chongjia.

Pick any one of them at random, and you’d have someone of great power and influence in the outside world. Their belongings were, naturally, extraordinary. Now, all of them had become Su Yi’s trophies. 

It was just a pity that… only a handful met Su Yi’s standards. 

He tossed the vast majority into the Divine Replenishment Furnace, either to refine pills or to temper the Sword of the Human Realm.

The Divine Replenishment Furnace was excited. Regardless of whether it was...
